name: repren (jlevy)
description: [项目级] Power rename/refactor tool (now with Claude Code skill support!)。来源: https://github.com/jlevy/repren

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Power rename/refactor tool (now with Claude Code skill support!)

来源: https://github.com/jlevy/repren
语言: Python
Stars: 370

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
No dependencies except Python 3.10+. It’s easiest to install with
[uv](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/):

```bash

genes.content:
Patterns can be supplied in a text file, with one or more replacements consisting of
regular expression and replacement.
For example:
```

genes.title: repren 模块说明
genes.content:
![But call me repren for short](https://github.com/jlevy/repren/blob/master/images/awkward-150.jpg)

* * *

> [!TIP]
> ✨✨ **NEW:** [v2.0.0](https://github.com/jlevy/repren/releases/tag/2.0.0) is out,
> refreshed for agent use!
> It’s self-documenting and has a self-installable skill.
> 
> Just tell Claude Code: *install repren as a skill, try uvx repren@latest --help*

* * *
